name: aura-sphere

effect_entries.effect: Hits Pokémon under the effects of dig and fly.

effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user looses a
blast of aura power
from deep within its
body. This move is
certain to hit.
